name: Supsis Ai
description:
Supsis Ai is an AI-powered omnichannel communication platform that connects businesses with their customers through WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Telegram, Webchat, Trendyol, and more. We empower brands to deliver seamless customer experiences by combining rule-based automation with advanced AI-driven chatbots and live support.

From appointment booking to e-commerce integrations, Supsis Ai offers a fully customizable and scalable SaaS solution that includes CRM, automation flows, an advanced event manager, personalized campaign tools, and detailed analytics.

Our platform is trusted by leading brands like Vatan Bilgisayar to provide intelligent customer support, product discovery, and targeted promotions through messaging. Supsis Ai enables businesses to engage, convert, and retain their customersâ€”wherever they are.
